reqs:
This is an introductory course on Kwakwala.
Please note: the location of this class is NOT on the UBC-Vancouver campus: classes will be held at the Native Education College (NEC).
There will be a $40 Course Materials Fee due in class by Sept. 19.
For information on registration for this course, please contact: [patricia.a.shaw@ubc.ca]
courseName: Introduction to a Wakashan Language I
description: Emphasis on accurate pronunciation, conversation, basic grammatical structures, listening and literacy skills, and the study of oral traditions in their cultural context. No prior knowledge of the language is assumed. Not offered every year.
